suncertify.business.rmi

Class RmiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.business.BasicContractorService
      • suncertify.business.rmi.RmiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Remote, ContractorService, RmiService

    public class RmiServer
extends BasicContractorService
implements RmiService
    Subclass of BasicContractorService and implements RmiService. Can be used to start an RMI server on a specified port number and book/find contractors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RmiServer(DBMainExtended data)
      Constructs a new RMI server instance with the specified data access object.

      • RmiServer

        public RmiServer(DBMainExtended data)
          throws RemoteException
        Constructs a new RMI server instance with the specified data access object.
        Parameters:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
